content: I think this is an excellent sentiment, and while I’m all for the glory of America, you and your GOP brethren have done little to stand against Trump’s blustery crusade against the people and security of this nation. He is clearly unfit to serve, and yet he remains in power, with no investigations against his conflicts of interests proceeding. For how long will he be allowed to wage war against our Muslim and immigrant neighbors? For how much longer will he be permitted to collude with Russia? When will you and your fellow senators stand strong in direct opposition to his reach for tyranny?
